TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlDataSourceCommandType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the type of SQL command used by the and controls when performing a database operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> controls to describe the type of SQL command contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A> properties. The Text value indicates that the text is a SQL query or command string while the StoredProcedure value indicates that the text is the name of a stored procedure.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> text to the name of a stored procedure and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommandType%2A> property to the StoredProcedure value to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>.
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/CS/sql14cs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/VB/sql14vb.aspx#1)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType StoredProcedure = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The text contained in a corresponding text property is the name of a stored procedure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType Text = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The text contained in a corresponding text property is a SQL query or command.
